initialRuleset..{5}: Password length must be minimum 5 characters
initialRuleset.\\d: At least one digit must be used in the password
initialRuleset.^(?:(.)(?!\\1{2}))+$: No more than two repeating characters allowed (like 'bbb' â€“ 2 are allowed, but not 3 or more)
initialRuleset.^(?=.*[A-Z])|(?=.*[!@#$%^&*]): Password must contain at least one upper-case character OR alternatively one special character
